responses:
I'm an intelligent AI that's been trained to perform meteorological analysis. My current capabilities are : 
 1. I can tell you the current dew point. 
 2. I can tell you the current UV Index. 
 3. I can tell you the current wind speed and direction. 
 4. I can tell you the current temperature. 
 5. I can tell you the today's highest and coldest temperatures. 
 6. I can tell you how much it rained today. 
 7. I can tell you what time the sun will set today.
